Make your cooking easy and comfortable with this deep fryer from Tefal. With its 3-litre oil capacity and adjustable thermostat it becomes the ideal kitchen tool to make delicious fries or deep fry your starters. This fryer has a solid stainless steel body with a metallic filter to keep out the cooking smells and fumes. It also has a viewing window to keep an eye on the fries.
